Spirit Beckoned.name: Spirit Beckoned
Spirit Beckoned.fullText:
Shyran Spiritblade Attack 11Spirit Beckoned

As you strike your foe with your blade, your spirit companion senses its weakness.

Encounter        Primal, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Intelligence or Wisdom vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Intelligence or Wisdom modifier damage.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus on attack rolls with spirit powers against the target, and a successful attack knocks the target prone.


Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 70.
Spirit Beckoned.flavor: As you strike your foe with your blade, your spirit companion senses its weakness.
Spirit Beckoned.range:
Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Intelligence or Wisdom vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Intelligence or Wisdom modifier damage.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus on attack rolls with spirit powers against the target, and a successful attack knocks the target prone.
Spirit Beckoned.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus on attack rolls with spirit powers against the target, and a successful attack knocks the target prone.

Spiritspell Assault.name: Spiritspell Assault
Spiritspell Assault.fullText:
Shyran Spiritblade Attack 20Spiritspell Assault

You charge your blade with arcane energy, and as you strike, you focus another spell through your spirit companion.

Daily        Arcane, Force, Primal, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Intelligence vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage.

Effect: Make a secondary attack with one of your swordmage at-will attack powers, as if you were in your sprit companion’s square.


Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 70.
Spiritspell Assault.flavor: You charge your blade with arcane energy, and as you strike, you focus another spell through your spirit companion.
Spiritspell Assault.range:
Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Intelligence vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage.

Effect: Make a secondary attack with one of your swordmage at-will attack powers, as if you were in your sprit companion’s square.
Spiritspell Assault.effect: Make a secondary attack with one of your swordmage at-will attack powers, as if you were in your sprit companion’s square.

One with the Blade.name: One with the Blade
One with the Blade.fullText:
Shyran Spiritblade Utility 12One with the Blade

You coax your spirit companion into your blade, making your attacks more precise.

Daily        Primal, Spirit
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Your spirit companion disappears. You may spend a healing surge, and you gain a +2 power bonus to melee weapon attacks until the end of the encounter or until you next use call spirit companion.


Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 70.
One with the Blade.flavor: You coax your spirit companion into your blade, making your attacks more precise.
One with the Blade.range:
Personal

Effect: Your spirit companion disappears. You may spend a healing surge, and you gain a +2 power bonus to melee weapon attacks until the end of the encounter or until you next use call spirit companion.
One with the Blade.effect: Your spirit companion disappears. You may spend a healing surge, and you gain a +2 power bonus to melee weapon attacks until the end of the encounter or until you next use call spirit companion.
